sections.summary: i am responding, with great interest, to the advertisement for aâ carrier overhaul network schedulingâ position.â i would be an ideal match for this position. i am a 15 year military veteran that servedâ his country with hard work and dedication.â i am looking forward to bringingâ trades to your company, in addition to my extensive professional experience, i have aâ ton of experienceâ in carrier overhaul planning, scheduling, and administrative skills. my broad background makes me an excellent candidate for this position. i look forward to meeting with you in person to further discuss my qualification. thank you for your time and consideration.
